name: Silence In The Victorian Cellar
description:
Full of dark, creeky and melodic pieces the album forms a full picture of what Yakbone is all about. The album was recorded over a number of years, in various rooms and with various instruments at Closer Still Studios in London.

One track has already been used in a short film by director Robert Kelly. "Country Hallway" was used as the title music to his film "30 Seconds"

Full track listing:

1. Orange
2. Silence In The Victorian Cellar
3. Country Hallway
4. Comfort
5. Plastic Flowers From Kemble
6. Song To Nowhere
7. Song To Nowhere Part Two
8. Kiss Fur
9. Shallow Shallow
10. Wooden Beast
11. Broken Fly

Full track listing:

1. Digital
2. White Light
3. Road
4. Street
5. Comfort

name: Closer Still Recordings EP2
description:

Full track listing:

2. Road Of Dust
3. Glasses
4. Hamsa
5. Rocks, Like The Statue Of Liberty

7. Black Comets
